name: Bready To Die?
description:
Controls:

Move: WASD

Attack: Left-click

Sprint: Left shift

Equip bread knife: 1

Equip mold grenade: 2

Show objective: Hold Tab

The game:
You play as a celiac boy who is baked out of his mind. You have been shrunken down to the size of a crumb, surrounded by bread, lame and dumb.
